SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , HTHR_HIFE_AMT , HTHR_HIFE_DDC_AMT , MCUR_HIFE_AMT , MCUR_HIFE_DDC_AMT , HTHR_UI_AMT , HTHR_UI_DDC_AMT , MCUR_UI_AMT , MCUR_UI_DDC_AMT , INFEE_USE_AMT_SUM , INFEE_DDC_AMT_SUM , BRW_LNPB_SRM_AMT , BRW_LNPB_SRM_DDC_AMT , RSDT_LNPB_SRM_AMT , RSDT_LNPB_SRM_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR15_BLW_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR15_BLW_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR29_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR29_DDC_AMT , LTH_Y30_OVER_ITR_AMT , LTH_Y30_OVER_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2012_AFTH_Y15_AMT , LTH_YR2012_AFTH_Y15_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2012_ETC_BRW_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR2012_ETC_BRW_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_FXN_IR_ITR_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_FXN_IR_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_Y15_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_Y15_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_ETC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_ETC_DDC_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_YR15_AMT , LTH_YR2015_AFTH_YR15_DDC_AMT , HSNG_FNDS_DDC_AMT_SUM , CONB_LGL_USE_AMT , CONB_LGL_DDC_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_OTH_USE_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_OTH_DDC_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_USE_AMT , CONB_RELI_ORG_DDC_AMT , CONB_USE_AMT_SUM , CONB_DDC_AMT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167050 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167050 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
